get.description: List notification preferences for the authenticated user.

post.description: Save notification preferences for the authenticated user.

get.description: List notifications for the authenticated user.

parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property,(asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.
parameters.name: sort

put.description: Mark the specified notifications as read.
Mark the specified notification as read.
Disconnect my connection from a third-party platform.

parameters.description: The registration ID of the third-party platform.
parameters.name: registerId

get.description: List posts owned by the current user.

parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property,(asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: Posts filtered by category including sub-categories.
parameters.name: categoryWithChildren

post.description:
Create my post. If you want to create a post with content, please set
 annotation: "content.halo.run/content-json" into annotations and refer
 to Content for corresponding data type.

get.description: Get post that belongs to the current user.

parameters.description: Should include patched content and raw or not.
parameters.name: patched

put.description:
Update draft of my post. Please make sure set annotation:
"content.halo.run/content-json" into annotations and refer to
Content for corresponding data type.

delete.description: Move my post to recycle bin.

parameters.description: Should include patched content and raw or not.
parameters.name: patched

get.description: Get TOTP auth link, including secret
List attachments of the current user uploaded.

parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property,(asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: Filter attachments without group. This parameter will ignore group parameter.
parameters.name: ungrouped

post.description: Create attachment for the given post.
Upload attachment to user center storage.
Upload attachment from the given URL.

path.description: A JSON Pointer path pointing to the location to move/copy from.

value.description: Value can be any JSON value

first.description: Indicates whether current page is the first page.

hasNext.description: Indicates whether current page has previous page.

hasPrevious.description: Indicates whether current page has previous page.

last.description: Indicates whether current page is the last page.

page.description: Page number, starts from 1. If not set or equal to 0, it means no pagination.

size.description: Size of each page. If not set or equal to 0, it means no pagination.

ownerName.description: Name of User who uploads the attachment

size.description: Size of attachment. Unit is Byte

permalink.description:
Permalink of attachment.
If it is in local storage, the public URL will be set.
If it is in s3 storage, the Object URL will be set.

hasNext.description: Indicates whether current page has previous page.

hasPrevious.description: Indicates whether current page has previous page.

last.description: Indicates whether current page is the last page.

page.description: Page number, starts from 1. If not set or equal to 0, it means no pagination.

size.description: Size of each page. If not set or equal to 0, it means no pagination.
